Rollup merge of #78811 - a1phyr:const_io_structs, r=dtolnay

Make some std::io functions `const`

Tracking issue: #78812

Make the following functions `const`:
- `io::Cursor::new`
- `io::Cursor::get_ref`
- `io::Cursor::position`
- `io::empty`
- `io::repeat`
- `io::sink`

r? `````@dtolnay`````
